channel.title: Letting admins trade? (Erasedpkz loader)
channel.description: I'm hosting my server atm, and I trust my admins enough to trade people... using the impozzes dicing source originally. I found a boolean in config.java that looks like this [code=java]public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true;[/code] Of course, I changed it to true... but that doesn't let admins trade. Can someone tell me what file I can let admins trade in? And what I should be looking for in the file?

item.title: Letting admins trade? (Erasedpkz loader)
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

Are you sure that you have compiled? If you have then find the trade method and look over it to see how this variable is being used (if it is).

Read full topic

item.title: Letting admins trade? (Erasedpkz loader)
item.dc:creator: @Brandon_Codes Brandon Codes
item.description:
@Brandon_Codes wrote:

I’m hosting my server atm, and I trust my admins enough to trade people… using the impozzes dicing source originally. I found a boolean in config.java that looks like this public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; Of course, I changed it to true… but that doesn’t let admins trade. Can someone tell me what file I can let admins trade in? And what I should be looking for in the file?
